organizations: Global Hydrology Resource Center, Marshall Space Flight Center, NASA
title: CAMEX-3 POLARIMETRIC SCANNING RADIOMETER (PSR) V1
summary: The Polarimetric Scanning Radiometer (PSR) is a versatile airborne microwave imaging radiometer developed by the Georgia Institute of Technology and the NOAA Environmental Technology Laboratory for the purpose of obtaining polarimetric microwave emission imagery of the Earth's oceans, land, ice, clouds, and precipitation.
